org.xlattice

Class SigVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.SigVerifier

  • public abstract class SigVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Given a PublicKey, instances of this class can verify digital signatures.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon
